mapper.insert: INSERT INTO day ( schedule_id, day_number, departure_time, start_accommodation_index, end_accommodation_index, start_stay_duration, end_stay_duration, start_travel_car, start_travel_bus, end_travel_car, end_travel_bus ) VALUES ( #{scheduleId}, #{dayNumber}, #{departureTime}, #{startAccommodationIndex}, #{endAccommodationIndex}, #{startStayDuration}, #{endStayDuration}, #{startTravelCar}, #{startTravelBus}, #{endTravelCar}, #{endTravelBus} )
